data.message: Anton Timo I have listened to all his music he has called his fans out before jokingly he always usually states at the end im just playing.....Don't remember him once saying he was just playing in that cypher do any of you lol. Unless your talking about dont approach me Its not that I don't like you it's just when i'm not behind a mic i'm a person just like you. Thats a bit different situation though! So ya pretty darn sure he was serious! lol
